bibl.author: John M. Binckley
bibl.title: John M. Binckley to Hugh McCulloch, 19 August 1867
bibl.idno: Entry 10, Record Group 60, Letter Book F

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have the honor to request that you will issue a warrant on the Treasurer of the United States, in favor of S. M. McKean, Esq. Disbursing Clerk, Treasury Department, for the sum of Twenty two hundred and seven Dollars & seven cents, ($2207:07/100,) & charge the same to the appropriations indicated below.
Salary of the Attorney Gen'l. for August, 1867 $644.43
